Summary: Black object sighted midflight between Fort Lauderdale and Salt Lake City.
trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Salt Lake City
There were no other sightings in Salt Lake City on or around June 24th 2006
divs: sighting detailsthis happened at some point in june in the year 2006. my family and i were going home from a cruise in the caribbean. during the flight from fort lauderdale to salt lake city i looked out my window and noticed a black object when i looked down to see the landscape. it looked like one of the seeds you get stuck on you clothes while walking through tall grass (http:\\en.wikipedia.org\wiki\poa) but it had several longer spike like protrusions coming off the back of it about the same length as the main part of the object, as far as i could see there were no lights or windows on it, just a reflectionless black hull. it didn't seem to be changing altitude or distance to the plane. i told the passenger next to me, they looked and did not notice it. the closest man made vehicle i know of to what this looked like is the f-117 nighthawk stealth fighter but the object was too different to be an f-117. it stayed with us for quite a while, i eventually stopped watching and every once in a while i'd take a look and there it was right in the same place as last time but the last time i looked i didn't see it anymore. wish i could have gotten a closer look but it didn't happen and i didn't have binoculars or anything to give me a better view.
